desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 16th International Conference on Entertainment Computing, ICEC 2017, held in Tsukuba City, Japan, in September 2017.

details.authors: Nagisa Munekata (Editor),‎ Itsuki Kunita (Editor),‎ Junichi Hoshino (Editor)

title: Entertainment Computing – ICEC 2017: 16th IFIP TC 14 International Conference
